name: Mixed Berry Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake topped with a vibrant assortment of mixed berries and a berry glaze.

name: Berry Nut Cake Slice
description: A delicious slice of cake featuring a berry cream filling and a crunchy nut topping.

name: Chocolate Raspberry Mint Slice
description: Rich double-layer chocolate cake slice with a creamy filling, adorned with fresh raspberries, mint, and a dusting of cocoa.

name: Blueberry Oat Bran Muffin
description: Wholesome and flavorful muffin packed with juicy blueberries and topped with oats and nuts.

name: Blueberry Lemon Loaf Cake
description: A moist and zesty lemon loaf cake, generously topped with fresh blueberries and a delicate dusting of powdered sugar.

name: Chocolate Cherry Mug Cake
description: A decadent individual chocolate cake, lavishly topped with whipped cream, chocolate shavings, and cherries, served with a sprig of mint.
